abilities.desc: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.
abilities.name: Storm Hammer

abilities.desc: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
abilities.name: Great Cleave
abilities.notes: The cleave damages a circular area in front of Sven.

abilities.desc: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts 9 seconds.
abilities.name: Warcry

abilities.desc: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for [35] seconds.
abilities.name: God's Strength
abilities.notes: The bonus damage is based on base damage and the primary attribute of Sven.
